sub_topic: Determining the length of a side in an isosceles triangle.
message_1: In an isosceles triangle, the length of one of the congruent sides is 6 cm and the base is 8 cm. What is the length of the other congruent side?
message_2: In an isosceles triangle, the two congruent sides have equal length. Since one of the congruent sides is 6 cm, the length of the other congruent side is also 6 cm.
